summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Arabic RTL Admin Panel for Transfers app. All core features tested successfully including login, navigation, interactive features, and mobile responsiveness.

ui_bugs.issue: Logout button click intercepted by Emergent badge overlay in bottom right corner
ui_bugs.workaround: Logout functionality works but may be blocked by overlay positioning

passed_tests: Login functionality with correct credentials (admin@transfers.com / admin123)
Dashboard loading with statistics cards and charts
Navigation between all admin pages (Users, Drivers, Restaurants, Rides, Orders, Promotions, Settings)
Orders page with comprehensive data display
Promotions page with add new promotion functionality
Settings page with various configuration options
Add new promotion dialog and form submission
Arabic RTL text display and layout
Protected route functionality (redirects to login when not authenticated)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: Adjust logout button positioning or z-index to prevent overlay interference from Emergent badge. All other functionality working perfectly.
